summary.overview: This JCL job sets up the complete CICS environment for the CARDDEMO credit card application by defining all necessary system resources including user interface screens, business programs, and transaction entry points. It establishes the foundation for credit card processing operations including customer account management, transaction processing, bill payments, and administrative functions.
business_functions: Define CICS library for CARDDEMO application load modules
Create user login and authentication screen interfaces
Set up account management screens for viewing, updating, and deactivating customer accounts
Define card management interfaces for credit card operations
Establish transaction processing and reporting screen definitions
Create bill payment setup and processing interfaces
Define administrative function screens and menus
Register all business application programs with CICS system
Create transaction entry points for user access (CCDM for admin menu, CCT1-CCT4 for testing)
Group all CARDDEMO resources for organized system management
Generate resource verification listings for system validation

CBADMCDJ.jcl.program_overview: CICS System Definition Utility - Defines and manages CICS system resources

datasource_summary.name: CICS System Load Module Library (OEM.CICSTS.V05R06M0.CICS.SDFHLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains CICS system load modules required for CICS program execution and system operations

datasource_summary.name: CICS System Definition File (OEM.CICSTS.DFHCSD)
datasource_summary.function: Stores CICS resource definitions and configuration data for CARDDEMO application resources management

datasource_summary.name: CARDDEMO Application Load Module Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains CARDDEMO application load modules and serves as source library for CICS application program definitions

flowchart TD
